attributes.action: recognise that he is a public servant and to stop treating the UK population with disdain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No. 10's recent remarks about the "fuss over nothing" with regard to the recent signing of the EU Treaty in Lisbon indicate that Mr Brown has no regard for the populace which he claims to govern. His attitude is arrogant and we want it to change.

The 'fuss' clearly indicates that 'something' is causing consternation and he should act as if he actually cares about representing us rather than dismissing any views contrary to his own.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
